# Brew Orzhov
<br/>

**Aliases**: `WB Brew`


**Dominant mana**: <img src="../resources/images/mana/W.png" class="dominant-mana-icon"/> <img src="../resources/images/mana/B.png" class="dominant-mana-icon"/>

**Type**: `Aggro`/`Midrange`/`Control`/`Combo`

**Description**:
